name: The Good, The Bad, and the Blocky
name_original: The Good, The Bad, and the Blocky
description:
The era of the Wild west, desperados, wild outlaws, and any gun totin’ fool wants the bounty on your head. Will you stand your ground? Or will you be the coward surrendering yourself?

  • Voxel artwork!
  • Arcade shootin’, lootin’ and rootin’!
  • Defend your territory in this wave based shooter!
  • How long will you survive?
